title: Why is teaching your vocation, mission and profession? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not a teacher. I enjoy writing about how it's done well and why it's not done well, usually due to incompetence or ideology. I think teaching is a great vocation, mission, and profession. But the problem we have now is that our Education Establishment is more concerned with social engineering than with academic success. A sad situation. When Socialists with their own separate agenda take over your schools, you are lost. Reversing this curse in American K-12 is my vocation, mission, and profession. I think the great thing is lifting each student up to his or her potential.

As soon as you answer another’s question you become a teacher. We all are. Some really enjoy imparting knowledge to others. It is also a strong from of communication which is also what most of strive for on this planet.
